alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex; Northumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued May 07 at 10:05AM EDT until May 09 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Northumberland, Mathews, Lancaster, Gloucester and Middlesex Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/03 PM 2.3 0.9 1.4 1-2 NONE 08/05 AM 3.3 1.9 2.1 4 MINOR 08/05 PM 3.4 2.0 2.4 4 MINOR 09/06 AM 3.8 2.4 2.6 3 MODERATE 09/06 PM 3.7 2.3 2.7 3 MODERATE 10/06 AM 3.9 2.5 2.8 3 MODERATE LEWISETTA VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/07 PM 2.9 1.4 1.7 2-3 NONE 08/07 AM 3.0 1.5 1.6 3 MINOR 08/08 PM 3.1 1.6 1.9 2-3 MINOR 09/08 AM 3.7 2.2 2.3 2 MODERATE 09/09 PM 3.8 2.3 2.5 2-3 MODERATE WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/02 PM 3.1 0.4 1.0 1-2 NONE 08/03 AM 4.4 1.7 2.0 3 NONE 08/03 PM 4.9 2.2 2.8 3-4 MINOR 09/04 AM 5.4 2.7 3.0 3 MINOR 09/04 PM 5.2 2.5 3.0 3 MINOR 10/04 AM 5.3 2.6 3.0 3 MINOR YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/03 PM 3.1 0.5 1.2 1 NONE 08/03 AM 4.5 1.9 2.4 1-2 MINOR 08/03 PM 5.1 2.5 3.2 2 MODERATE 09/04 AM 5.1 2.5 3.0 1 MODERATE 09/04 PM 5.2 2.6 3.2 1-2 MODERATE 10/05 AM 5.2 2.6 3.1 1 MODERATE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
